attributes.action: The UK to bid 2030 Football World Cup. The 2012 Olympics were brilliant.
attributes.background: The Olympics were such a success in 2012. Time to replicate that success again. A joint bid with the Football Associations of England, Scotland, Wales & Northern Island would help unite the U.K. post Brexit rather than a England only bid.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise isn't the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament.

Bids for the World Cup would be the responsibility of the Football Association.

You could start a new petition asking the Government to urge the Football Associations of the UK to work together on a bid, if that's what you want to happen
